fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Rule the Kingdom of Italy into World War 2
- Lead an offensive against Britain in North Africa
- Require German aid in North Africa
- Lead an offensive against Greece in the Balkans
- Require German aid in the Balkans
- Lead an offensive against yourself in Italy
- Require German aid in Italy

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Auto loss, Italian military too corrupt
